## EmbedArgs interface

Perform an LLM vector embedding of the given text field into the given output field.w

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EmbedArgs extends InputColumnArgs, OutputColumnArgs 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [InputColumnArgs](./schema.inputcolumnargs.md)<!-- -->, [OutputColumnArgs](./schema.outputcolumnargs.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [model?](./schema.embedargs.model.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The embedding model to use. (Will use a configured default if not set.) |
